about_the_game:
Experience the dark and mysterious in Chapter 1 and discover the unheard of underneath the restaurant in Chapter 2.

You play as Andy a documentarian who is making a video on the Janko restaurant and all of its mystery's.
Andy arrives at the Janko restaurant with his friend Dell to gather footage of the place when something go's terribly wrong,
Now Andy and Dell will find out more about this mystery than they ever thought they would.

Janko is a mascot horror game inspired by survival horrors game's like Resident Evil and immersive sims like System Shock.

Explore a dark and forgotten restaurant while trying to get information on the CEO of Jank.co
find notes from the employees, discover secrets with a UV light, solve puzzles and hope you don't run into the things in the dark,
because if you do the only thing you can do is run.



Along your adventure you may find tools and unique items to help you on your mission such as a stun gun,
with the stun gun you will be able to temporarily disable any threats you may encounter
just make sure you have enough ammo for it or attempt sneaking by without anything noticing you


This game contains jumpscares proceed with caution

name: Janko
short_description: Explore Janko's a popular restaurant established in the 80's that mysteriously closed down in the 2010's. You will have to run and hide or fight the danger that lies beneath.
